title: Madeira cake with mulled wine sauce

default: 100ml/3½fl oz cherry juice from a tin

steps: Place the red wine with the spices, cherry juice, sugar, orange zest and orange juice into a saucepan over a high heat. Bring to the boil and then reduce the heat to simmer for ten minutes until the liquid has reduced by a half.
To serve, pour the mulled wine into a bowl and top with slices of Madeira cake.
